p: Phenolic compounds contained in plant extracts have variant antioxidant effects [ 28]. The quantities of total polyphenols measured by HPLC were considerably reduced than those found by the Folin–Ciocalteu technique. This result might be ascribed to the poor discrimination of the Folin–Ciocalteu reagent, as it reacts positively with different antioxidant compounds (phenolic and nonphenolic substances) [ 40]. Besides, we have analyzed ten polyphenolic compounds though there is a huge number of polyphenols.
